H0.text: Similarities in bone structure are evidence from the fossil record that could be effectively compared with modern day evidence to support the hypothesis that dinosaurs were endothermic like birds.

H1.text: Seasonal shifts in food supply are evidence from the fossil record that researchers can effectively compare with modern‑day evidence to support the hypothesis that dinosaurs were endothermic like birds.

H2.text: Consumption of the same plant species is evidence from the fossil record that could be effectively compared with modern day evidence to support the hypothesis that dinosaurs were endothermic like birds.

H3.text: Tree rings indicating the return of a similar climate could be effectively compared with modern‑day evidence to support the hypothesis that dinosaurs were endothermic like birds.
